thread.title: Keith

author: Keith
title: Keith
text:
I am a first time customer of Brake Performance and my first experience was a good one. I purchased all new rotors, pads, E-brake shoes and hardware for my F150. All of the components were delivered as ordered. The made a call before charging my card to verify my identity too. The warranty stated that all torque spec must be used or it will be void. I called to confirm my axle nut torque specs as well as my lugs and they got me the answer right away. Nice to know I can call and talk to a real person, and that all of the products are manufactured right here in the US.
Keep up the great work! I'll be returning for sure!
